page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MOIRA
page.content: This morning I got up at 07.30 and made my own breakfast. I had{Farmhouse {Bran,}brown bread and milk. After breakfast I always take my dog for a walk and then go to school which starts at 09.25. Today is Friday so we work on our{BBC computer.}Lunch is from 12.30 to 13.15.Then we have{music until 14.15.After that the girls get{ {netball}and the boys get{football} until 15.15 when we go home. At 16.00 on Fridays I go to{folk group}practice in our church.After dinner I play tennis with my friend Claire. When I come home I watch{T.V.,}have my supper and go to bed at 22.00.{ { (P.16 _ 20 St. Bernards Primary S.) {************************************** {**} Co-ordinated and produced by:{ ** {**} Robert Patrick & Philip Wilson{ ** {*}Stranmillis Primary School,Belfast{* {***************}1985{*****************
